thread.title: GOFIT, LLC

author: GOFIT, LLC
title: GOFIT, LLC
text: Happy with the purchase for our small company - I wish the water container had a bigger capacity but all in all a great machine. Love the self cleaning feature. The newer models have different descaling instructions than what was in the manual but Whole Latte Love was very quick in replying to my inquiry about this problem. I do recommend ordering the cleaning supplies with your machine so you are ready when the indicator lights prompt you to descale.
